settings.text: At EightStudio, we believe in celebrating style, community, and creativity! Our events are designed to inspire and bring together our fashion-loving community. Whether it’s a fashion show, a pop-up shop, or a workshop, there’s something for everyone. Stay tuned for exciting happenings, and be part of our journey!

settings.title: Fashion Forward: Style Workshop
settings.text:
• Date: Saturday, March 15, 2024
  • Time: 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM
  • Location: EightStudio Flagship Store, Downtown
  • Description: Join us for an interactive styling workshop where our expert stylists will guide you on how to mix and match pieces from our latest collection. Enjoy exclusive discounts for attendees!

settings.title: Spring Collection Launch Party
settings.text:
• Date: Friday, April 10, 2024
  • Time: 6:00 PM - 9:00 PM
  • Location: EightStudio Flagship Store, Rooftop Garden
  • Description: Celebrate the launch of our vibrant Spring Collection! Enjoy drinks, appetizers, and live music while being the first to shop the new arrivals. RSVP required!

settings.title: Kids’ Fashion Fun Day
settings.text:
• Date: Sunday, May 20, 2024
  • Time: 10:00 AM - 3:00 PM
  • Location: EightStudio Flagship Store
  • Description: A fun-filled day for kids and parents! Join us for games, activities, and giveaways, plus a special fashion show featuring our children's collection. Don’t miss out!
